Class Witch

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Witch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Witch
extends Entity
    The class used to represent a Witch.
    Author:
    Tony Cui, Jiayin Huang, Sally Hui
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • advance

        public void advance()
        Advances the witch in the simulation by one tick. Overrides the advance() method in its parent class.
        Overrides:
        advance in class Entity

      • resolveCollision

        public void resolveCollision(java.util.List<Entity> colliding,
                    double dx,
                    double dy,
                    double dTheta)
        Deals with collisions.
        Overrides:
        resolveCollision in class Entity
        Parameters:
        colliding - the List of all of the Entities that this Entity is colliding.
        dx - the distance moved along the x-axis
        dy - the distance moved along the y-axis
        dTheta - the angle rotated
        See Also:
        Entity.notifyCollision(Entity)

      • move

        public int[] move(java.util.ArrayList<Entity> prey)
        Generates the next move of the witch, based on the shortest distance from it to its prey. This allows the Witch to move in 8 directions.
        Parameters:
        prey - the entity that the witch is focussing on
        Returns:
        the point in array form of the next move

      • random

        public int random(int min,
         int max)
        Generates a random movement.
        Parameters:
        min - the lower limit of the movement distance
        max - the upper limit of the movement distance
        Returns:
        the random integer
